A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First you should see the movie and form your own opinion\, however in my opinion this movie is bad. There are to many plot holes\, the slapstick comedy\, and the forced attempts at humor were all bad. The portrayal of Luke Skywalker was what officially killed this movie for me. It was a slap in the face to all the fans. I wish that The director had listened to Mr. Hamill and had done this the right way.
